title: LF Top/Mid/Jungle! Gold 1+ please!
body:
**EDIT:** SPOTS FILLED! Thanks guys!

Hey guys,

We are looking to make a team to hit the not-so-solo queue next season.

**Top:** "Nightlord99" (Platinum 5)
**Jungle:** "Mystery" (Gold 2)
**Mid:** "Cush Cush" (Platinum 4)
**Marksman:** "President Scrub" (Platinum 5)
**Support:** "SirhcEz" (Gold 5)

**Bit of info about us:**
Scrub and I have been playing together for over 3 years, which is why I have decided to support him this coming season in hopes that we will find better solo laners than myself.

**Pre-reqs:**
Voice Comms - Not needed, only prefered (teamspeak 3)
Ability (yes, it is an ability) to receive constructive criticism after each game
Gold 1+ Highly Suggested

Happy gaming!
Andrew.

replies.body: Hey man, i am a jg main. The champs i play are rengar and lee sin

Cheers mate, will update the post and have a chat/few games with you tomorrow!

EDIT: I have to head out for the night, look forward to talking with you!
